It happens when displaying the CVS console window.

This is happening during reactivation of the previously active part. Could you 
tell me what perspective you were in and what views were open? It looks like 
the problem may have been caused by a fast view. Do you remember which views 
you may have had as fast views?

I don't remember in which perspective I was.
But this was the only fast view I had

I was in the cvs repository perspective and the problem is caused by 
console fast view.
Resource history in the java view is working ok.
I have been unable to reproduce this. If it reoccures for you, please reopen.
